com._604robotics.robot2012.vision

Class ResultImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com._604robotics.robot2012.vision.ResultImage

  • public class ResultImage
extends java.lang.Object
    A result image that holds an image of how well pixels match the expected color of the vision target. It is treated like a giant boolean array externally, but internally it is split up into small tiles.
    See Also:
    Result
